Work faster and smarter with plan add-ons
-----------------------------------------

**Premium Phone Numbers**
-------------------------

Need a phone number? We’ve got you covered. Phone numbers can be rented in Close, and if you’re looking for business phone capabilities, upgrade to a Premium Phone Number.

*   **Lead-based call routing**: Route inbound calls to the right rep.
*   **Personalized phone menu**: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) lets you direct callers with a custom greeting.
*   **Round-robin routing**: Distribute calls fairly across your team.

$19 / phone line / month 

**AI Call Assistant**
---------------------

Never take call notes again. We (and AI) will take it from here.

*   **Automatic transcriptions:** Clear, searchable call transcripts (in any language).
*   **Summarized action items:** Get a searchable post-call summary including action items and owners.
*   **Talk time analysis:** Improve rep performance and active listening.

$50 / month + $0.02 per minute  
Available to all users on your account
